com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app

Class AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartnsoft.droid4me.app.AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AppPublics.BroadcastListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AppPublics.LoadingBroadcastListener, AppPublics.ReloadBroadcastListener
    Enclosing class:
    AppPublics

    public abstract static class AppPublics.ComponentBroadcastListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements AppPublics.BroadcastListener
    A broadcast listener which listens only to AppPublics.UI_LOAD_ACTION intents.

    It is commonly used for Activity and Fragment, to get events when the entity is being loaded.

    Since:
    2010.02.04
